attributes.action: Protect the safety of two young boys from being a political sacrifice
attributes.additional_details:
Two very young boys have been placed in an inexplicably dangerous position as a sacrifice to the Central State of Slovakia by the UK legal system and government.  Within two weeks they are to be flown out of the country to live with the family that abused and neglected them, who speak a language they have never spoken, in a country they have never lived in.

Please sign this petition to put pressure on the Government for the case to be heard as a welfare case, away from political intervention.
